text: I am trying to copy about 155 items from one portal to another but keep getting this error:
Is there a max number of items that can be copied from one portal another
I made sure there are no SVG files, just regular modules/templates/css/js files
very annoying to have to reselect those, trying to make a copy of portal into a test portal, HubSpot does a backend dependency linking so using CLI only for new pages/modules

Hey Chris, a 155 item copy definitely seems to be pushing the limits of what our system can handle here :disappointed: We're working on making that service more resilient lately. Normally I would recommend using the CLI to copy from one portal to another though, so can you explain what you mean by this comment? I'm a little confused by it
